titles.title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to repeal the provision of law requiring termination of the Advisory Committee on Minority Veterans as of December 31, 2009.
To amend title 38, United States Code, to repeal the provision of law requiring termination of the Advisory Committee on Minority Veterans as of December 31, 2009.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary: Repeals a Federal provision requiring the termination of the Advisory Committee on Minority Veterans as of December 31, 2009.
